}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *'''Dell Wireless 1801 / DW1801''' :Dell P/N: 0KJTH7 (A00/A01) *Dell Inspiron 5459/5559/5759, Dell Vostro 3459/3559 models (XPS 8900)
This device uses the [[Realtek RTL8723BE Combo Module]] reference design. :"RTL8723BENF" is silkscreened on the back of this card.
The FCC test report specifies multiple card types... *'''NGFF''' M.2 (2230) :PCIe for WLAN and USB for Bluetooth :MHF4 antenna connector *'''NGFF''' :SDIO for WLAN and UART for Bluetooth :MHF4 antenna connector *'''HMC''' (Mini PCIe Half miniCard) :PCIe for WLAN and USB for Bluetooth :U.FL antenna connector
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.dell.com/support/home/us/en/19/Drivers/DriversDetails?driverId=M77M3 Support page] (WLAN) {{â€¢}} [https://www.dell.com/support/home/us/en/19/Drivers/DriversDetails?driverId=NRYG3 Support page] (BT)
==See also== *[[Realtek RTL8723BE Combo Module]] :''802.11bgn + BT RTL8723BE Combo Module'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TX2-RTL8723BE TX2-RTL8723BE] (2013-05-08) *[[Dell Wireless 1801 (DW1801)]] (10ec:b723/10ec:8739) :PCI\VEN_10EC&DEV_B723&SUBSYS_873910EC :Dell Wireless 1801 Card - Dell Wireless DW1801 (0KJTH7) :WLAN WiFi 802.11b/g/n + Bluetooth 4.0 M.2 Card (laptops)
